longBusinessSummary: Standard Uranium Ltd., a junior exploration company, explores, acquires, evaluates, and develops uranium properties in Canada. Its flagship property is the Davidson River Project, containing 10 contiguous mineral dispositions covering an area of approximately 30,737 hectares located in the southwest part of the Athabasca Basin, Saskatchewan. The company also holds interests in Atlantic, Canary, Ascent, Corvo, and Rocas Projects, comprising twenty-three mineral claims covering an area of approximately 29,520 hectares located in the eastern Athabasca Basin, Saskatchewan. In addition, it holds 100% interests in the Cable Bay SW project, consisting of two mineral claims covering an area of 3,158 hectares; the Ox Lake project, consisting of one mineral claim covering an area of 397.5 hectares; and the Brown Lake project, consisting of one mineral claim covering an area of 312 hectares, located in Athabasca Basin region, northern Saskatchewan. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Sean Christopher McGrath B.Comm (Hons), CPA, CGA
companyOfficers.title: CFO & Corporate Secretary
